featured.text: Type-A people are generally considered sensitive perfectionists and good team players, but over-anxious.

definition.zh_def: 對事物追求完美的人，對自己的工作或表現有極高的要求。
definition.en_def: A person who demands perfection in their work or performance and has very high standards.
definition.example: As a perfectionist, she spent hours making sure every detail of her project was flawless.
